title: Buy or Sell Philippine Stocks via GStocks PH
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

[How can I buy PH stocks in GStocks PH?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/17532438364057-How-can-I-buy-PH-stocks-in-GStocks-PH)

[How can I sell PH stocks in GStocks PH?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31210966987161-How-can-I-sell-PH-stocks-in-GStocks-PH)

[How do I check the status of my GStocks PH order?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31211043753497-How-do-I-check-the-status-of-my-GStocks-PH-order)

[How can I change or cancel my GStocks PH order?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31211092525593-How-can-I-change-or-cancel-my-GStocks-PH-order)
